author: markt
msg: Fix bug 42727. Handle request lines that are exact multiples of 4096 in length.

author: adrianc
msg: Some Asset Maint fixups based on the previous commit. Now the Asset Maint calendar works better.

author: lryan
msg: Added support for 'expires' param to rewriter to control what cache-headers the open-proxy should enforce.

author: sebor
msg: * include/vector (vector): Removed Allocator base class, replacing
it (in a binary compatible way) with a new member, _C_alloc, instead.
(vector): Initialized the _C_alloc member instead of allocator_type
(~vector, begin, end, size, max_size, empty, swap): Referenced
(pop_back, push_back): Used the new _C_alloc member to destroy
the vector part of the issue.
